ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلْتَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Did you do this to our gods, Ibrahim?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did you do this to our gods, O Abraham?" they enquired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (On Abraham's arrival) they said: "Abraham, are you he who has done this to our gods?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They asked, "Abraham, did you do this to our idols?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Did you do this to our Gods, O Ibrahim?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Are you the one who has done this to our gods, O Ibrahim"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Have you done this to our gods, O Ibrahim?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'So, art thou the man who did this unto our gods, Abraham?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Is it thou who hast done this to our gods, O Abraham?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Abraham, was it you who did this to our deities?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: art thou the one who hath wrought this unto our gods, O Ibrahim?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Was it you who did this to our gods, O Abraham?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said, "Art thou the one that did this with our gods, O Abraham?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Are you the one who has done this to our gods, O Ibrahim (Abraham)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Abraham' they said, 'was it you who did this to our gods'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Are you the one who did this to our gods, O Abraham?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:62] They said, to him, after he had been brought [before them]: ‘So, is it you (read a-anta, [either] pronouncing fully the two hamzas; or substituting an alif for the second one, or not pronouncing it [the second one], and inserting an alif between the one not pronounced and the other one, or without [this insertion]) who has done this to our gods, O Abraham?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said) Nimrod said to him: (Is it thou who hast done this) i.e. breaking them (to our gods, Abraham?
